msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The following changes apply to DataGrid only.
The set methods for Grid properties that affect the measured size or display now invalidate as appropriate.
Fixed the rowHeight and requestedRowCount property default values in DataGrid/gridPropertDefaults.
When the Grid columns property changes, update the ColumnHeaderBar's dataProvider.
Temporarily removed support for column generation.
Fixed the intermittent empty DataGrid problem.
QE notes: changes apply to Spark DataGrid only
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Renamed Grid defaultItemRenderer property to "itemRenderer".  Added an grid.itemRenderer cover property to DataGrid.
Revised the way DataGrid properties that "cover" grid skin part properties are defined.
Added support for auto column generation.
Made columnSeparators extend to the limit of the Grid (SDK-26892 remains incomplete, waiting for more information).
QE notes: changes apply to Spark DataGrid only
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Allow text in the default DataGrid item renderer to wrap.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The following changes apply to Spark DataGrid only.   Code reviews have been deferred until the implementation is closer to completion.
Changed DataGridSkin's VGroup so that it respects DataGrid explicit sizes and constraints.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The following changes apply to Spark DataGrid only.   Code reviews have been deferred until the implementation is closer to completion

Added/revised DataGrid,Grid typicalItem property.   GridLayout now computes GridColumn widths, for columns without an explicit with, based on the typical item renderer's preferredBoundsWidth().  GridLayout does not yet give the ColumnHeaderBar a shot at increasing column widths based on its own items.  See GridLayout/updateVisibleColumnWidths().

Removed GridLayout override for typicalLayoutElement since it's not used.   And since typicalLayoutElement doesn't make sense, since one "typical" layout element is needed per column.   See GridLayout/createTypicalItemRenderer().
Commented out body of GridLayout/measure() for now.   This is going to need work.
Removed explicit width values from DefaultColumnHeaderRenderer.

Changed DataGridSkin to use a VGroup to layout the ColumnHeaderBar and Grid.  We'll want to Change ColumnHeaderBarLayout to support an indent, rather than relying on the scheme I've installed for now.
